definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
(old) musicians at a wedding cortege or funeral procession/(fig.) trumpeter of sb's praises/booster

sentences.english: He is one of the most talented and inventive drummers in modern music.
sentences.chinese: 他是現代音樂界最具天賦和創造力的鼓手之一。

sentences.english: Pinocchio was not able to walk, therefore, the boss sold him to an old drummer.
sentences.chinese: 木偶行唔到，於是老闆就賣左比個老鼓手。

sentences.english: The band director cued the drums to begin.
sentences.chinese: 樂隊指揮暗示鼓手們敲起來。

sentences.english: I only like Dave Brubeck with this quartet , and the drummer is what is driving him.
sentences.chinese: 我只喜歡戴夫布魯貝克此四方，和鼓手正是推動他。

sentences.english: I am a drummer myself, and what Dave does in this video does not require a double kick pedal at all.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的鼓手，和戴夫在這個視頻不需要雙一腳踏板。

sentences.english: The rules also apply to drummers.
sentences.chinese: 這項新規定同樣適用於軍隊的鼓手。

sentences.english: The Pariahs were a specific caste whose hereditary job it was to act as the drummer in those festivals.
sentences.chinese: 帕利亞階層的人世世代代都在那些節日裏擔任鼓手。

sentences.english: A hollow metal rod with a heavy rubber tip or tips that is wielded and twirled by a drum major or drum majorette.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手揮舞使用的，頂端是厚橡皮的中空的金屬棒。

sentences.english: The drummer threw down his instrument and brought Charlie to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手把鼓棰扔向查理讓他停下來。

sentences.english: Joining Jennifer and Karen on the CD are Andrea Niemiec on the string double bass and Terry Ostergaard on the bodhran.
sentences.chinese: 雙低音伴奏是安德烈尼米克，鼓手是特里厄斯特高。

sentences.english: A hollow metal rod with a heavy rubber tip or tips that is wielded and twirled by a drum major or drum majorette .
sentences.chinese: 鼓手揮舞使用的，頂端是厚橡皮的中空的金屬棒。

sentences.english: Established and played as a band drummer.
sentences.chinese: 王利波曾組建樂隊，擔任樂隊鼓手。

sentences.english: Nor you drummers, neither at reveille at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手莫悲，拂曉晨號你不要吹。

sentences.english: However, as a trumpeter father and son are taken care of, he has to wake up.
sentences.chinese: 不過經吹鼓手父子的悉心照料，他已經醒過來。

sentences.english: The drummer beat the soldiers to arms.
Women's Championships are restricted to female paddlers only except the steersman and drummer.
sentences.chinese: 女子錦標賽之劃手必須由女士擔任，舵手及鼓手除外。

definition: Bes, a minor god of ancient Egypt
vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
